lines.text:
[Joy walks over to her mom, who is gardening]
Mom.

[Hands Joy red plastic cup with with flower in it]
This is for your tea party.

[Joy accepts cup with flower]
Thank you.
[Joy leaves to go back inside the house]

[Violet and Joy have been fighting. Joy runs out of her room to the edge of the stairs. Violet comes out of the room and runs at her. Joy spins Violet around and pushes her so Violet is leaning backward with her back against the bannister. Joy keeps Violet from falling by using one hand to hold on to a pearl necklace which is around Violet's neck]
Help.

[Joy grabs the pearl necklace with the other hand. Violet doesn't grab her hand, instead leaning her head back and raising her arms in the air. The necklace breaks and Violet falls backwards down the stairs. Violet lies motionless at the bottom of the stairs, presumably dead. Violet doesn't move when Joy walks down the stairs, steps over her body, and walks out of the house]

Do you know what kind of people like pain? Let's see, there's doctors and lawyers. I even have a judge for a client. But you know, it's not the pain that gets them off. It's the feeling of someone else being in control.
